AdminConsentDisplayName: Allows the app to create new activities in your teamwork activity feed, and send new activities to other users' activity feed, on your behalf.
AdminConsentDescription: Send a teamwork activity as the user
DelegatedPermissionId: Allows the app to create new notifications in users' teamwork activity feeds on behalf of the signed in user. These notifications may not be discoverable or be held or governed by compliance policies.
ApplicationConsentDescription: Send a teamwork activity to any user
ApplicationPermissionId: Allows the app to create new notifications in users' teamwork activity feeds without a signed in user. These notifications may not be discoverable or be held or governed by compliance policies.
